title: Brandy Milk Punch
body: * 1 Tbsp of fine white sugar* 2 Tbsp of water* 2 oz of brandy (1757 Virginia Brandy)* Tumbler of shaved ice.Fill glass with milk (a cup and a half or so), shake ingredients well together, and grate with nutmeg on top.I expected to hate this, and while it's not a thing I think I will drink very often (if ever again), it's actually quite delightful. I just don't like milk enough to drink it "on the reg".
